result.markdown: --- title: "R Talk RLadies Pasadena" description: "A presentation about building a personal website by using blogdown" date: "2019-11-17" categories: - presentations - r --- ![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/XUKEREN/Building-a-Personal-Website-Using-Blogdown/master/imgs/Rladies.jpeg) I shared my experience in building a personal website by using blogdown at [R-Ladies Pasadena November meetup](https://www.meetup.com/rladies-pasadena/events/265962563/). Thanks [Donna](https://twitter.com/CaltechChemLib) and [Zhi](https://twitter.com/zhiiiyang) for organizing this event.
